segments.text: I feel so drawn into this domestic scene, it almost feels like I’m intruding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s concentration is commendable, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Each drop of water falling to the floor feels like a countdown to misfortune.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's that boy, reaching over the edge with reckless abandon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout out, to warn them, but I feel frozen in place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, her face lit up with the thrill of cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's exhilarating and terrifying at the same time, watching their risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR
